features: MotionFit 360°: MotionFit 360° is patterning that is engineered to move fluidly with your body. It offers maximum freedom of movement, and feels exceptionally light.
Running pack compatible: Extra volume on the back of your jacket, allows you to wear it over a running pack.
GORE-TEX® Active with Shakedry™ technology: Garments engineered with GORE-TEX® Active fabrics are built for extreme breathability and are ideal for highly aerobic, done-in-a-day activities
